Summaries.eng: Anime series centering on the adventures of Patty Rabbit, Bobby Bear, and their families, in a small utopian anthropomorphic city
Summaries.jpn: 前作『メイプルタウン物語』の続編に当たり、主人公であるウサギのパティが、前作の最終回にて引っ越してきたアメリカ西海岸にあるという町・パームタウンにて過ごす日常が描かれる。

Aliases: Shin Maple Town Monogatari: Palm Town Hen
しんメイプルタウンものがたり パームタウンへん
新メイプルタウン物語 パームタウン編
メイプルタウンものがたり

Titles.eng: OAV 1 - The Hot Air Balloon Cruise
Titles.jpn: メイプルタウン物語 (1986年の映画)

Summaries.eng: The story takes place in Maple Town. Johnny, a friend of Patty's, would like to fly in the sky but he is afraid of the altitude. Patty, with her friends Bobby and Fanny, searches for a way to realize her dream and learns that a balloon trip will be organized in the village. She will take Johhny on the ball but everything will not go as planned because the wolf will also be on the trip ...

Titles.jpn: メイプルタウンの消防隊

Summaries.eng: A special episode broadcast in Japanese schools on 16mm reels (and rare VHS) to educate children about the risks of fires, then to present the profession of firefighter / fire brigade with Patty, Laurie (Lory) as well than residents of Palm Town.

Titles.jpn: メイプルタウンの交通安全

Summaries.eng: A special episode broadcast in Japanese schools on 16mm reels (and rare VHS) to educate children about road safety. Patty accompanied by Laurie (Lory) welcome Bobby's three brothers to raise awareness about road safety with the help of Aunt Jeanine.
This film follows season 1 of Maple Town, it resumes episode 1 of season 2 with excerpts from episode 52 of season 1.
